title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-5.4 - Permit application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-5.4 - Permit application requirements

State Regulations
A C&D debris handling and recovery facility that is
not exempt or subject to the registration provisions of section
361-5.3
of this Subpart must obtain
a permit and must submit an application that includes the requirements
identified in section
360.16
of this Title and a
description of how the facility will comply with the operating requirements in
section
360.19
of this Title and the design
and operating requirements in section
361-5.5
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-5.4

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Amended

New

Amended

New

York State Register June 21, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 25, eff. 7/23/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
